    • Method Detail

      • getCurationsFeedItems

        public void getCurationsFeedItems(CurationsFeedRequest request,
                         CurationsFeedCallback callback)
        Get curations feed using specified parameters
        Parameters:
        request - The request is used to specify parameters which will be used in the Curations GET request
        callback - Callback is used to handle successful and unsuccessful requests Note: This method keeps a weak reference to the CurationsFeedCallback instance and will be garbage collected if you do not keep a strong reference to it. }.

      • postContentToCurations

        public void postContentToCurations(CurationsPostRequest post,
                          CurationsPostCallback callback)
        Post Content to curations
        Parameters:
        post - The content you would like to post.
        callback - Callback is used to handle successful and unsuccessful posts Note: This method keeps a weak reference to the CurationsPostCallback instance and will be garbage collected if you do not keep a strong reference to it. }.
